name: History Leaks
description:
Play as a shady museum curator in his crazy quest to upgrade his collection and gain more visitors.

Controls : 
- Dpad  (Arrow keys) to move
- Start (Return key)
- Select (Right shift key) to select item
- A  ( X  key) to interract 
- B  (C key) to use item

---

Initially, the game was supposed to contain 4 levels, but because of some unexpected bugs and difficulties only one level is playable. 

Know bug : at the end of the game (results screen) there is a little error in check mark, but it is not a big deal

---

The game was programmed in 8 days  in C++ with the NasNas game framework.

Source code can be found on the github repo of the game : https://github.com/Madour/GB_OLC_Jam2020
